title: Get Inspired
info: Get inspired. Peruse or search through professional photos or other users' public galleries.

title: Assemble Your Vision
info: Build a flexible mood board to visualize your upcoming project. Drag & drop, resize, and add notes to each image.

title: Plan Your Shoot
info: Build equipment, prop, and wardrobe lists with your board. Set your goal date and reminders to keep you on track.

title: Share Your Work
info: Share your completed vision with other photographers in your own gallery. Add links from your gallery to your social platforms to promote your work further.
